Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
    Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.
    The available feature descriptors are listed in ParserFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features
    Features specific to the tokenisation phase.
    The available feature descriptors are listed in TokenPatternMatchFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features 
    Class and Description
    TokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a TokenWrapper for Token features.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger 
    Class and Description
    TokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a TokenWrapper for Token features.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser 
    Class and Description
    TokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a TokenWrapper for Token features.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features 
    Class and Description
    AbstractTokenAddressFunction 
    AbstractTokenFeature
    An Abstract base class for intrinsic features.
    TokenAddressFunction
    A function that, given a reference token, can return another token.
    TokenFeature
    A feature which tests a Token, ignoring any context (e.g.
    TokenPatternMatchFeature
    A feature which tests a TokenPatternMatch during tokenising.
    TokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a TokenWrapper for Token features.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns 
    Class and Description

    A feature which tests a TokenPatternMatch during tokenising.
